description:
Telefónica’s corporate venture capital arm, Wayra, has announced its investment in AI answer engine Perplexity. Perplexity’s AI-driven platform aims to revolutionise internet information searches by providing real-time, accurate, and contextual answers to queries using natural language processing. Unlike traditional search engines that return a list of links, Perplexity understands the intent behind questions and delivers... Read more »

The post Telefónica’s Wayra backs AI answer engine Perplexity appeared first on AI News.
title: Telefónica’s Wayra backs AI answer engine Perplexity

description:
Machine learning (ML) is revolutionising the way businesses operate, driving innovation, and unlocking new possibilities across industries. By leveraging vast amounts of data and powerful algorithms, ML enables companies to automate processes, make accurate predictions, and uncover hidden patterns to optimise performance. From personalised customer experiences to predictive maintenance and advanced fraud detection, the potential... Read more »

title: Innovative machine learning uses transforming business applications
